meanings.definition: Eight times as much or as many.
meanings.sent1: The octuply amount of candies made the children very happy.
meanings.sent2: The octuply increase in population led to overcrowding in the city.
meanings.sent3: The octuply number of balloons at the party made it a colorful sight.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was octuply compared to mine when she saw the surprise.
meanings.sent5: The octuply size of the cake made it impossible to finish in one sitting.

meanings.definition: To increase or be increased eightfold.
meanings.sent1: They plan to octuply their savings by investing wisely.
meanings.sent2: The company's profits octuply over the last year.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could octuply the hours in a day to get more done.
meanings.sent4: The garden octuply in beauty after the spring rains.
